RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 14 Engineer, Manager and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 19, 2025, 10:37 IST
 Rail India Technical and Economic Services
 14 Jobs |  Posted On : 19-Jul-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 23,340 to 160,000




FOLLOW

The Rail India Technical and Economic Service (RITES) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 14 Manager, Engineer, and Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, application fee, education details, and how to apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




 If you are looking for more, here's a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. See this link for more jobs in Maharashtra.

RITES Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Manager	02	B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering
Assistant Manager	04
Engineer	08

Age Limit for the RITES Notification 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40years.

Selection Process for the RITES Notification 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the RITES Notification 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 23,340 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: 1,60,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the RITES Notification 2025

SC/ST/PWD Candidates: Rs 300/-
General/OBC Candidates: Rs 600/-
How to Apply for the RITES Notification 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career Page
Check for the Manager Notification 2025
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply online link.
Register with your mobile number and password.
Fill out the mandatory details carefully.
Upload the scanned required documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further usage.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-07-2025
Last Date of Application	18-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
